Title: Silverlight Layouts
Description:
Silverlight Layouts is a project for controls that behave as content placeholders
with pre-defined GUI layout for some of common scenarios: 

  - frozen headers, 
  - frozen columns, 
  - cyrcle layouts etc.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Silverlight Layouts is a project for controls that behave as content placeholders
with pre-defined GUI layout for some of common scenarios:

- frozen headers,
- frozen columns,
- cyrcle layouts etc.
